column9: 2015 in waterbury. she was the loving wife of the late sam guastella. grace was born in waterbury on september 9
column11: daughter of the late michele and rosaria (granieri) santoro. grace dedicated her life to her family as a homemaker having raised her five children. she was a communicant of st. lucys church and a member of their holy rosary society. she loved cooking and traveling and most importantly spending time with her family. she had a special place in her heart for each and every one of them. she leaves five children: ross guastella of watertown
column12: michael guastella and his wife judy of port charlotte
column14: thomas guastella and his wife mary of prospect
column15: sandra gittings and her husband kenneth of oakville and robert guastella of southington
column17: dominic santoro and his wife mary of wolcott
column19: joanne smeraglia of waterbury and pasquale santoro and his wife phyllis of middlebury
column21: eighteen great grandchildren and many nieces and nephews. she was one of eleven children. arrangements: funeral will be held saturday 9:30 a. m. from chase parkway memorial/the albini family funeral home
column23: waterbury to st. lucys church for a mass of christian burial at 10:30 a. m burial will follow at calvary cemetery. calling hours will be held saturday from 8:30 a. m. to 9:30 a. m. at the funeral home. memorial contributions can be made in graces memory to: st. lucys church 24 branch street waterbury
